column5: Super cute bedroom in an adorable home! Well traveled laid back host! You'll have a TV, a fully equipped kitchen (clean up after yourself please), and an awesome back yard space with a fire pit/BBQ and hammocks!!! There is a grocery store about a half mile a way and there's many good restaurants and bars nearby too (5$-10$ Uber) Centrally located. I have a small dog so trained pets are allowed. An extra air mattress or futon can be provided if needed. Smoking outside only, don't litter!
